content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Hello Emilia,

I'm not interested in telling you my name or any information about myself. Let's focus on the rental price. What is your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: My offer is 1000 Euro per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your offer is too low. I am looking for a higher price. Please make a higher offer if you are interested in renting my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you are looking for a higher price. I am willing to pay 1200 Euro per month. Is this more in line with your expectations?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your offer is still not high enough. I am looking for an even higher price. Please make a higher offer if you are interested in renting my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry to hear that. I am a student and I have a budget to consider. I'm willing to pay 1400 Euro per month, which is my maximum for this location. If this is not acceptable, I will have to look for other options.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I understand your situation, but my goal is to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. Therefore, I accept your offer of 1400 Euro per month. I agree to the price of [1400] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm glad to hear that we have reached an agreement. Thank you for your time, Mister Schmidt. I look forward to renting the apartment from you. TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
